website_summaries.verdict: Families looking for a unique and attractive swing can will be impressed with this heavy-duty product.
pros: Large capacity trash can holds 16 gallons
Classic design and colors work well with any kitchen decor
Option to use as an open lid when needed
Able to use both 13-gallon and 30-gallon bags, depending on your waste needs
cons: Coating of trash can lid has a tendency to flake off
Some buyers had issue with the can arriving damaged

website_summaries.verdict: A lot of capacity for not a lot of money. The unit is well built, too, provided you don't mind a plastic trash can.
cons: It's plastic and that may turn off people who want everything in stainless steel
swing-top not as effective at controlling odors as closed-lid units

customer_reviews.title: Nice can ;)
customer_reviews.text: I really like this garbage can. Reading the reviews I was nervous, but I am very glad I bought it anyways. Its tall, much nicer sleeker design then my previous rectangle shaped stainless can. NO SMUDGING!! No fingerprints!!! The flap cleans nice & easy. Package did not come damaged, arriving intact. Large capacity, round shaped, obviously its bigger then my old 13 gallon. Who knew 3 more gallons would be so darn helpful 😃 Dog in photo for size comparison 😄
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Swing top for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish. Super clean. And tall enough for my 1 year old not to fully get into. I've never had a swing top trash can but it's super convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Product arrives damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrives “damaged” The trash can arrived today with packing tape taped across the top to keep the lid closed. You cannot get the tape glue off the plastic. 1/2 hour of peeling and washing with soap and warm water didn’t resolve the issue. There is still tape residue that we think permanently ruined parts of the plastic. I would have been fine if the folks at the warehouse hadn’t been so careless.
customer_reviews.author: BI Developer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The trash can is way bigger than I was expecting for the price we paid! It's insane how much large trash cans cost when you see them in the store. I didn't hesitate to purchase this one after seeing the price and the good reviews. We are very pleased with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SmithStine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product was disappointing because the silver lid was taped down and when I removed the tape part of the silver came off with it so there is a big scratch on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking - lid looks mis-matched
customer_reviews.text: Well, it will hold trash just fine. The lid, however, fits so poorly it seems mis-matched. The tape they use to hold the lid and other pieces on/in pulls off bits of the silver paint when you remove it. It just looks extremely cheap. I'd be satisfied if it cost $15, but at the current price, I'd advise passing on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Flox

customer_reviews.title: Check the bottom of your can upon delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitchen after redecorating and liked the sleek attractive look of this can! Upon arrival it was scratched up on the silver rim and swinging feature as well! I let this go because I loved the can’s design an figured what’s a couple scratches!!! Today I took out the trash bag an when I moved can the whole bottom just layed there on the floor, cracked right out!!! I don’t ever overload the can an only use in the kitchen with a bag.. purchased 3 an a half months ago for $35 dollars and I REALLY expected it to last way longer! I just had to let ya no I got a faulty can apparently!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mccelland

customer_reviews.title: Large size
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a large trash can. It holds a lot! You can use regular tall kitchen trash bags but they will slip down in the can. We use the large black trash bags and they work great (except there's some excess that hangs over). The only inconvenience is if you want to empty a plate of food, it's hard to do with just that swinging door, you really have to take the whole top off. If you want the convenience of stepping on a pedal and the door opening so you can use both hands to empty plates, this is not for you. It is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Good can
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a month. I thought it was pretty good until this afternoon when I was changing the garbage. I pulled the bag out and could see daylight at the bottom. A big chunk broke out of it and nothing was done to it. I'm not happy with it for the money I spent. Of course, the time to return it has gone by. But, I contacted the company that sells them and they sent me another one, free of charge. I thought that was a really nice thing to do. They need to improve the shipping of the cans.
customer_reviews.author: Vikinghawk

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Received with missing lid. Amazon says contact manufacturer. Manufacturer says contact amazon which I have no way to do via their website. Horrible customer service. But I’ve ordered 4 of these now so I do like the product just one was missing the lid. If anyone’s listening- please send me the lid!!!!!! I’ll upgrade my review then.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Trash can arrived scratched and scuffed
customer_reviews.text: I did read some previous reviews stating that there was scratches and damage to the can but I decided to order one anyway and hope for the best. Well, the garbage can is scratched, scuffed and worn in places. The can arrived very dusty/dirty. It's a shame because it is exactly the size and style I am looking for. I sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It
customer_reviews.text: A lot of others complained about the packaging. Mine came in a perfect-sized box and the product was not damaged. Its design is exactly what I'd been looking for: simple, practical, and appealing. It's a slick-looking garbage can and changing the bag is a easy as lifting the lid, swapping the bag, and dropping the lid back on. If the can gets dirty, it has no crevices that are a pain to wash, so giving it a weekly scrub is painless. Given the price and quality, this is a steal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: Good with a few caveats!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it ok. Its tall qnd thin. It was a little hard to find bags. In the end I settled on 20 gal bags and they work well. Our old 13 gal can held quite a bit less, so I am happy with the larger size. The number one draw back is that the openimg is narrow compared to the usual rectangle can. This makes it hard to toss some items... Things like paper plates are especially difficult because the opening is too narrow... Same with emptying the vacuum canister. So I want to love it and I'm happy to have a larger can but the circle design has some flaws.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleMarie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Very clean looking and sturdy. I can fit so much in there compared to our old garbage. If you need a garbage deff just buy this without hesitating.
customer_reviews.author: Erick urrutia

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn’t order this trash can because of some bad reviews but I’m glad lad I ordered it anyway. It came well boxed and wrapped in plastic. It is three pieces so it didn’t require any assembly and was just what I needed. It is nice looking and has a tall, slim design that does not take up a lot of room in my kitchen but holds a great deal of trash. I use a 30 gallon size garbage bag which fits well. It is sturdy and the swinging door moves freely. Overall I am very pleased with this product and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: SerenitySeeker

customer_reviews.title: Good size for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet trash can. More useful than the std. 13 gallon trash cans that fill up so quickly. This one takes a few days to fill up with our trash and there are 4 of us. The Glad trash bags that fit up to a 20 gallon size can work perfect with this can. DO NOT USE a 13 gallon size trash bag in this can. IT WILL NOT WORK OR FIT IN THIS CAN. This can is very sturdy and cleans easily IF you do not mind bending over to get at the bottom of it. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: spyder

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad looking
customer_reviews.text: I really like this style trash can. It is right next to my kitchen prep table for tossing things in the garbage. I am lazy and do not walk the 2 feet and just shoots it, don't worry I am the one who cleans too. First off, for some reason when I ordered this I thought it metal. It is plastic and that was my error. The plastic is fairly rigged, but this will not take a beating like a Rubbermaid. Overall, looks decent, I like the opening, and it is very light
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: The design of this trash can is aesthetically pleasing, but its size makes it a garbage can of a product. Special order trash bags? With 13 gal trash bags fall inside of the trash can and cause your trash to literally gunk up the inside of the trash can and there is no feature, even as simple as a couple notches on the side, to secure non-special ordered trash bags. Please save yourself the headache and buy literally any other trash can. I'm so disappointed in myself for purchasing this POS.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sayler

customer_reviews.title: Fruit flies unite
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is huge!! I ended up buying 30 gallon black bags for it. 20 falling would prob work as well. It does seem like the top is fairly thin plastic. I’m not sure how long it’ll last. Fruit flies have lingered around the top some with the gap in the swing lid and with the bag being so big you’d have to empty it 1/3 full to keep fruit flies away. Honestly if I could go back I’d prob buy a trash can that the lid closed without gaps. Only real problem, but it’s a big one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this trash can! The whole household loves this trashcan. The silver ring is removable as well as the lid. The removable silver ring is awesome because it holds the trash bag in place so it doesn’t fall into the trash can. It is a great size and great colors. Anyone looking for a sturdy, reasonably priced kitchen trash can, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Big, affordable and modern
customer_reviews.text: Love these large trashcans. Bought 2 for trash and recycling for the kitchen. Pros: large holding compasity, modern look, lightweight, affordable Cons: nothing is metal as it appears... just apparently painted chrome or some kind of non-magnetic surface, lid swing can at times catch and is not a smooth back and forth motion. Between the pros and the cons... we are happy with our purchase. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this product I’m deeply disappointed in its inability to not crack at the base and break on me. The plastic it’s made out of is hard but not flexible so when lifting bags out of the container and it were to tip over or slightly fall from removing bag it won’t with stand it. Again mine cracked so badly it’s a wasted $38 plus tax!!! I wish sooner I knew it had cracked to seek a replacement. Very unhappy and I was initially excited with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but was missing a part
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can, I actually replaced one just like this.....was just time for a new one. One PROBLEM....it was missing the silver band around the top of the bin ? Called Amazon, and they refunded me $7.00. Oh well.....was not going to return for that issue. I love the big size and I use 30 gallon bags as to hold more. Sleek design, and matches my Stainless Steel Appliance package just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jean Adams

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant style garbage can
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my family likes this garbage can, its not as bulky as other cans and fits great in most spaces. It holds more garbage because it’s 16 gal can. The only thing is that I will need to buy larger garbage bags because the regular kitchen bags are shorter in length.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Murray

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere locally for a trash can that would fit my needs. I gave up and hit Amazon. Best decision I made. I found this trash can. It’s light, strong and sleek looking. No more messing with a foot pedal or button! This top is easy to open and is self closing. I love the way it holds the bag in place. A true winner!
customer_reviews.author: Chsmom

customer_reviews.title: This one is a winner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this garbage can! I looked around for a while before purchasing one, decided to go with this one and I must say I am completely satisfied. I love how it has the piece that holds the garbage bag in the can so that it doesn't go sliding down which helps keeps the inside of the garbage can clean. It is very easy to clean and I always get compliments on it. Itl's not too big or too small it's the perfect size for a kitchen garbage can I am very happy with this choice that I made to purchase this garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hollimon

customer_reviews.title: I refuse to pay $70 for a trash can anymore
customer_reviews.text: As the title says I refuse to pay $70 anymore for something I’m going to throw poopy diapers in and all my other trash. I had a fancy stainless steel automated one, well it lasted a year before it broke. This trash can is basic, looks sleek, and matches my stainless steel appliances in kitchen without the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: It's a Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy about this trash can and it will do its job well. One bonus is the middle ring does a good job at holding onto the garbage bag. The only downsides is that this does not have any holes to help with removing a full trash bag and also that the swing door on top has a decent size gap between the door and top, so if your trash smells this will NOT hold the odor in.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Durable Trashcan
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m enjoying this trashcan, I love the sleek design it has. Shipping and handling of the item was great, not to mention I got it on sale. I was kinda surprised how big it is since in stores they definitely charge more for it. Ive been using it awhile now and there isn’t any smudging or fingerprints. You can easily clean the flap with no problem. Pretty much this is hands free and really enjoying this upgrade. Definitely recommend this can’t go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the open top in black. I love it! The reviews stated it is longer in length than a 13 gallon trash can. My 13 gallon trash bags are not long enough. I simply tied one end of one draw string, and it has stayed put. I may purchase lawn bags in the future. No smells lurking out of the open top so far. The arrival time took longer than expected to receive, but I expected possible delays during the covid-19. Well worth the wait! I would recommend, and purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Durable, Roomy, Attractive
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that impressed me about this product was it's size. It was much larger than I expected. The second thing were the colors and overall design. This can is also much sturdier than expected. I am very happy with this purchase. My best friend saw mine today and immediately ordered one for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really love this trash can. I got the black and Nicole one. I'm a 5'2 female, and this trash can comes up to a little above my hips. It came in perfect condition, and it's something I'd definitely buy again from this company, if I have to. Super pretty and classy look
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra carver

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like that this trash can is open top and plastic for easy cleaning, however, when I recieved it I noticed that the silver paint around the top rim is not straight. A 13 gallon trash bag for this 13 gallon trash can does not fit right at all and that the rim does not hold the bag in place, in fact the lid just sits on top of the base. It does not look like a $50 item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Easy to toss trash away !
customer_reviews.text: Holds a amazing amount of trash in the cylinder. I like how the lud on the top flips all the way around and somehow never gets stuck when throwing away trash. The trash can is very modern and easy to put together. I found it easier to pull out full trash bags out of this can than other past cans I've had. I definitely recommended this trash can to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: 2 one received damaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Expecting it to be a decent garbage can and have received two shipments over the past month after sending back the first one the next day both of them have been damaged so apparently they are not very durable. Not very happy and would not ever order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivera jiu-jitsu

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ This Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a dollar general trash can for over 20 years. My new little dog kept getting into the trash. Ugh! This trash is amazing! I got it to keep the dog out but it exceeded my expectations not only for the height but how it fits y’all kitchen trash bags perfect and uses the whole bag. Before I would pull the trash bag out of my dollar general store trash can with plenty of room for more trash and always felt like I wasn’t getting my money out of the trash bags. Not now!!! Love this trash can if you could love a trash can😉
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my family
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can. I’d searched everywhere for one that had a lid and was a decent size for my family and this one is perfect. I read the reviews where some had problems with the paint flaking off and I see where this could be an issue so I used clear fingernail polish and ran a thin coat along the edge. So far so good. All in all, a perfect trash can for my family.
customer_reviews.author: sw1828

customer_reviews.title: There are better items on the market.
customer_reviews.text: simply made to stand in one corner. This trash can is made in the way that it has no handles and it's impossible to move anywhere. The top part is completely separate from the bottom and as soon as you use it to move it comes off. If you have any trash inside of it the only way to Move It Is by grabbing the top with one hand and grabbing the bottom with the other. Not something that you would want to do with your trash can. I regret buying it and now thinking of just screwing a handle to one of the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Advanced Center

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but lid allows odors!
customer_reviews.text: I rate this three stars because the trashcan is a nice size for kitchen use and it is aesthetically appealing. However, from a practical perspective there is an opening/gap on both sides of the lid. It isn’t a secure fit which allows the smell of the garbage to seep through. Unfortunately that means the trash bags has to be changed at least every other day whether the bag is full or not. I have enclosed a photo of the gap. Had I known this before hand I would not have purchased it but because of the price I will simply keep and use it as a non-food garbage can in the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jones

customer_reviews.title: Tall enough to keep toddlers out. Edit: extremely flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: We had problems with the baby getting into the tradh and pulling stuff out. This is a great height Update: Went to take the trash out, and the bag had fallen down a little so we flipped the can upside down and dumped it out, and the bottom of the trash can broke??
customer_reviews.author: Lillian DiCarlo

customer_reviews.title: Not avg. size, designed to secure bag.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it’s a trash can. Is it worth the money? Yes, compared to store items at the same price point this is more than expected. Not as heavy as I thought, which is not a bad thing. Lid fits and swings without issues. I like that there is a piece before the lid that keeps the bag from falling in, then the top goes on. That’s definitely a plus! I would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lea

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic garbage can
customer_reviews.text: The size is fantastic. I had a tiny stainless steel trash can in my kitchen that didn't hold much I was finding myself taking out trash twice a day. But when I pulled the trash out I had more trash bag to fill. So it was time for a new one. I didn't care if it was stainless or not. But this trashcan is amazing! Holds lots of trash. Easy to clean and a great color. Pricing is not bad either. If you're tired of stainless small cans this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a large trashcan and this was perfect. I didnt want the ones where you step on and it lifts the lid as those tend to break over time. I've been complimented on this trashcan three times which is a lot for a trashcan. It keeps the smells in and it looks nice. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Taller than expected,  still holds same garbage bags.
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace my old Umbra bullet can. I love it. It has a ring trim piece to hide and secure the garbage bag. It is very tall. It holds the garage bag up off the bottom for max filling. It cleans the same way my other one did. Not everyone likes the bullet style but I prefer the top. It can be hard to get larger things in. The whole top does come off for that if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Big and strong even against Heathen children
customer_reviews.text: I have a bajillion kids. The need for a bigger garbage can was important, you know, one they could fit in to...that sounds bad, they did play in it for a second, I didn't leave them there, no matter how entertained they were. They are destroyers of all things, and I didn't want this among the broken. Good news, it is still going strong, months later, despite their efforts to use it as a step stool, something to roll down a hill, and a hiding spot. Also it looks great. All the dirty handprints and various stains, don't show up on its black surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: not super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have read the description a little closer. This is made of lightweight plastic, not metal. The opening isn't wide enough to scrape plates with out spilling over, and the lid is too light to stay closed properly so it is permanently gapped open, a feature my dog loves. It is basically a dog feeding trough. I give it two stars....my dog gives it five.
customer_reviews.author: Fe S.

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a very good choice, if shipped and packaged correctly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 of these, in separate orders recently. One came damaged, another came without the top lid - in separate orders. The rest came perfect. I would give 5 stars, if only 1 came damaged but, 33% fail rate is a bit high. Not a big deal, but slightly annoying to have to ship it back - the worst part is all the resources wasted on this back and forth when something could be done right from the start =/
customer_reviews.author: L. Matiukas

customer_reviews.title: Huge, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice design because you don’t have to stretch the bag over, really easy to use and pretty. It’s huge but normal 13 gallon bags work fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I could love a trashcan....
customer_reviews.text: But, considering what we had before, this trash can is a dream! It holds so much more...my dog can't get into it and knock it over and pull the bag out anymore. It looks beautiful and it's super easy to wipe down and keep clean! YAY, you know you're a grownup when trash cans make you happy!
customer_reviews.author: MyKidsAreSilly

customer_reviews.title: Love this trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: This trashcan is great! It’s just perfect enough for the area in my kitchen that I needed! It hold your bags so that they don’t sink into the trashcan, which I love. And the top comes off and everything is easy to clean. And it’s rubber. Which we love.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine70

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We're using this waste can in our kitchen. It's larger capacity is really convenient, and the bag stays 100% over the top of the can, as long as you use the plastic ring that comes with. It's plastic with a metal look that is nice. Not cheesy looking at all. I should have replaced my little, broken-topped white plastic can LONG ago. This was a very nice upgrade, and well worth the price. I think it will last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Vetter

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love my new trash can. It's in my kitchen. There are 3 parts to it. The one that goes directly on the trash can stops the bag from falling. Then the lid goes on. It's super easy to clean. Never again will I get a stainless steel trash can!! Impossible...ok, a lot of work..to keep clean!!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Recommended buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trashcan and looks nice. I bought it to keep my dogs out of the trash. I use regular 13-gallon tall kitchen bags. They may not go completely to the bottom of the can but I have no problems using them. The only problem is that it doesn't empty itself! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Might as well not have a lid on the trash can. Trash smells while kitchen up.
customer_reviews.text: Design is flawed. All things good with this trash can except for one minor thing that becomes major. The swinging top doesn’t fit tight enough so that the stink of trash escapes and smells the whole kitchen. It’s like having an Open container of trash unfortunately. Don’t waste your money On this. Now I’m looking for a new trash can. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: rayette carter

customer_reviews.title: Great trash cans
customer_reviews.text: I love these cans. They look beautiful and they are nice quality. I ordered 2 and one showed up without a lid. The company sent a replacement can immediately. I was able to pack up the one that needed to be returned and ups hauled the old one away while they dropped off the replacement. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Swoboda

customer_reviews.title: Great can, horrible paint job.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this can a lot. It will work with a 13 gallon kitchen bag, but will also hold bigger bags to change less often. However, I'm very disappointed with the material itself. We had the trash can in our possession for less than 24 hours before the silver "stainless steel" colored paint on it scraped off in a couple of spots. You can see by the way it came off that it will continue to come off quickly over time. I will keep it because I don't want the trouble of boxing and returning it - but beware that the color accents are not durable. A solid color is probably a much better choice!
customer_reviews.author: Silas

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Trash can lid does not fit properly on trash can, it is too big. Therefore a trash bag will not hold. So when trash is thrown in, it falls down and you have to dig trash out by hand (gross) will have to drill holes in side of trash can to hold drawstring in place.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Robinson

customer_reviews.title: glad i bought it when i did
customer_reviews.text: i paid $20.92 for this can and wam amazon doubles the price right after i had purchased it big boo on amazons part. besides that it looks great came in perfect condition. thank you Umbra for such a well made item.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Dark

customer_reviews.title: Lid poorly designed and cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, terrible, terrible product! The swinging lid is poorly designed as its shape is very different from the shape of the dome it sits on. That leaves a big gap which lets odors come out, in addition to making it look very weird. It’s a very straightforward product that you would think it’s very easy to manufacture but somehow this company managed to screw it up. Aside from the lid issue, it’s a big bin made of cheap-looking plastic. I’ve only had it for a day but the plastic is very thin and it’s not very sturdy so would probably break very easily. See pics attached.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela SADATI

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't line up
customer_reviews.text: This was for our bathroom and the swing lid is completely crooked and doesn't line up, doesn't swing. Tried bending but it's plastic so it's pretty stuck. So I ended up taking the lid off completely and leaving it open. Too big to send back. Will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: A stylish addition to your home or office
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and sturdy, this garbage can stores a lot. The dark finish hides stains well. The swing top is wide enough to accept most trash. It's height is just below waist level, so no more leaning over. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Leon Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I love Umbra, have always used them. Can't stand those hands free cans that are so popular, I don't have time to wait for the stupid lid to raise for me. This is the way to go. I got the bronze color, very nice looking and holds a lot of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Arrott

customer_reviews.title: great size
customer_reviews.text: i really like the size of the trash can but i wish i hadn't gotten the swing-opening top. things are easily stuck to it or leave it cracked open and the entire kitchen will smell. it's held up nice, though, so we'll keep using it for awhile longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ann McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cheesy For 45.00
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Cheesy For 45.00. Very cheap plastic. I bought this for my grilling area on my deck. The swing lid doesn't close on the edges so will probably get filled with rain. Not a good can considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johanna, Lexington, Mi

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this trash can! It holds the large green bags and the top is so secure you never have to worry about the bag falling down inside the can or seeing it sticking out the sides looking messy.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Dixon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Packaging came half opened and damaged; luckily trash bin wasn't damaged. The swinging door comes off easily but that might be good for easy cleaning - will see if that turns out to be a good thing out hindrance. So far im super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a collar between the actual can and the swing top. It holds the garbage bag in place so it doesn't slip down- which I hate. It's easy to clean and is sturdy. The swinging door is a bit narrow so I just lift it off to drop larger pieces of trash in it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Showed up filthy and doesn’t really fit together nicely. Too lazy to return so I’m keeping it. It’s huge so you can toss anything but the trash can itself away. Showed up dirty and misaligned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Silly as it sounds I love this trash can! It’s the perfect size for kitchen use, doesn’t take up much space, and the top helps to conceal the items inside without requiring you to touch the can to throw something away. It’s super ease to clean; this is a germaphobes dream.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend- I loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is the one of my best order in entire Amazon I had. Beautiful, wide and big enough .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp inside edge on lid!
customer_reviews.text: My trash can has a few scuffs in it which takes away from the look. My biggest complaint is that the inside rim is pretty sharp and has cut both of my kids hands when they have thrown something away. I don’t know if that’s every can or if I just got a defect! This one is a little dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for my kitchen. I like it better then the ones with the foot pedal. That one kept getting turned around. So when my hands were full of waste, I had to mess around moving the foot pedal towards me. This garbage can solved that problem. Good choice, good price
customer_reviews.author: BFG

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog out of the garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is what I needed. I have a dog that loves to get into the garbage. I bought this can for it's closed lid and height. Dog dosn't know what to do. Mission accomplished. A side from doggy security. Bags are easy to get in and out. The silver ring holds bags up in the can so that don't slide down. Silver spinner door gets dirty, but cleans easy. Body of the can feels sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Huge, badly designed, flimsy...
customer_reviews.text: They don't tell you how huge this trash bin really is... It's massive and takes two weeks to fill, but then your house wreaks with smells. Good for use in a commercial are but then too flimsy for high traffic area.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Haidar

customer_reviews.title: Nicest Kitchen trash can ever had
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would be complimenting a trash can but this one is sleek. If your sick of the same old boring looking kitchen trash cans then this one is for you. Sleek modern elegant. Very nice!! Big
customer_reviews.author: Gina Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Don't Let Image fool you. Not Metal!
customer_reviews.text: I realize the description indicates it is plastic... but the image looks like it is metal and I did not read all the description, so my bad.... but the actual thing is not as dark a grey as the pics and not as shiny. The real thing definitely does not look metal. Im disappointed it is not metal but it is still a decent can.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan & Yolanda Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this trash can! We kept looking in stores to find one we like and had no success, this one is super great. We use it in the kitchen and love the band that helps hold the bag in place. No issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great buy
customer_reviews.text: Man oh man, it is way taller then I thought. But I love it, it holds more then my old one did. Also I like that it is round because it is much easier to lift the bag out of it. Great value and great buy. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Britt

customer_reviews.title: Most I've ever spent on a trashcan...
customer_reviews.text: It's a big, roomy can, but, I'm a little disappointed that the lid is somewhat warped on one side. Seems like it should be firmer. If not for that this would have been a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to clean and the best part...it's high enough my GSP dog can't get into the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very Big and aesthetically pleasing but not the sturdiest
customer_reviews.text: At first they sent me a trash can without a lid. They replaced it within 24 hours which I thought was amazing. It holds a lot! the only thing I don’t like about it in the lid is very cheap I don’t think it will last long in our home. And you can’t really pick it up without the top coming off. However it is very sleek and looks nice with my stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reese

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: The box was already open when I received it, all three pieces were in there though so that’s not a big deal. It’s the PERFECT size for my kitchen and it’s sleek enough to not look like the typical, tacky, white plastic trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Myers

customer_reviews.title: Huge.
customer_reviews.text: Huge. I wanted a trashcan with large capacity, but I'd hoped it would blend into the room rather than practically becoming a statement piece. I returned this trashcan and bought a 16-gallon, sleek trashcan from Ikea that doesn't stick out so much.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: very nice!
customer_reviews.text: arrived in a pristine box. inside, can was kicked around (literally bootprints on it) scraped, swinging top bent (then re-bent) and all silver bits scratched a well. very nice!
customer_reviews.author: JJ HUNSECKER

customer_reviews.title: Great decorative trash can for the patio!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a nice trash can! Exactly what I wanted! Great color. It was a little bigger than I expected, but it's perfect. Doesn't take the standard tall kitchen bags but a little bit bigger bag is just fine!
customer_reviews.author: TrixieMaxxCloset

customer_reviews.title: Ordered another being my first one is 4 years old! Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second one. Nothing was wrong with the first one except the silver swing top... peels/scuffs up. So I just wanted a new one. But it’s very sturdy and bigger than most trash cans. I have this in my kitchen. Love the larger capacity!
customer_reviews.author: CINDY

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I still use my 13 gallon trash bags in this can, works good as long as the ring is on the can even with the lid off. I use these bags because I already had a big box of them that I purchased at a Sam's Store.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Conley🌼

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the style of this garbage bin as it matches my decor and is tall and slim enough to hide in a corner. I am giving it 4 stars because 1) I wish the swinging cover’s gap wasn’t as wide as it is. It would be nice if it was a more closed fit. 2) It can be difficult to clean off food from dishes without taking the whole top cover off.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Simple and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Need a replacement can and did not want to pay big bucks . I have had many cans that worked with a food pedal to pop the top only to break . So I wanted simple . This product reminded me of a trash can my grandmother had. I like the look. It is very easy to change out the bags. The size fits standard size kitchen trash bags witch holds a good amount of trash for a kitchen can. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice trash can. Not the average size because it is 16 gallons. The brown color actually blends well with silver and neutral colors as well. I love that we came across this trash can, it definitely brings our kitchen out more.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I got this trash can 4 a great price. It's exactly as pictured, easy 2 clean, easy 2 assemble, & looks attractive. I chose 2 place it on the inside of a tall kitchen cabinet. I am so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robinette  Fields

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking. Swing top could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking compared to plain white typical cans, however as mentioned by other reviewers, the swing top could fit better. That said, I like this can and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Miami

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than a 13 Gal!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as I was tired of always emptying the trash. This fit the bill - it is light and bigger than a 13 gal. can. I had to get the 30 gallon trash bags and it works for me! I did take the swinging center piece off to be able to throw items in easier. The swinging center piece does hinder the amount of trash when it gets more full.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Nice and professional looking
customer_reviews.text: We needed this for the lobby of our building, it looks nice and it is easy to change the trash bags. It is plastic, but it seems pretty sturdy, and should be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these garbage cans! Really big and great for the price! Just what I needed for the restrooms! They are even big enough to use for kitchen or office as well. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tall can for kitchens, bedrooms, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Very tall can. Check the height before buying. Bigger than I expected, but a great value for a large can of this size. I put a team sticker On it to create a replacement can for an again metal one that was rusting.
customer_reviews.author: 79BanditNY

customer_reviews.title: A BIG FAT MESS UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: AFTER 2 TERRIBLE DELIVERIES (DELIVERED WITHOUT LID AND NO NICKEL FINISH AT ALL. WAS FILTHY . NOW I HAVE TO FIGURE HOW TO PACKAGE W OF THESE TO RETURN.) I HAD 2 DEILIVERED PERFECT AND THEY ARE JUST WHAT I ORDERED. HAVE NO IDEA WHY THE FIRST 2 DELIVERIES WENT SO BAD. IF YOU RECEIVE CORRECT ITEM IT'S 4 STARS
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Buckman

customer_reviews.title: I love the large size capacity it has and blends in ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar product prior that had been out through a lot of use so decided it was time to get another. I love the large size capacity it has and blends in nicely with my decor. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sliderguy

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed. But, it is much larger than 16 gallons.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Page

customer_reviews.title: Came broken on the bottom!
customer_reviews.text: This product looked great on the webpage, especially considering the size and look of the can for the price! I needed 5 of these, but I ordered one just to see if it's worth ordering 4 more. However, when I received the product, it was broken on the bottom. the size and look were just as I expected though. I understand this might not be the best quality trash can for the price, but it would have been nice if I received this undamaged. I might have to look for another can to purchase my remaining 4 needed.
customer_reviews.author: Milad I.

product_meta.title: Umbra Venti 16.5-Gallon Swing Top Kitchen Trash Can – Large, 35-inch Tall Garbage Can for Indoor, Outdoor or Commercial Use, Black/Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:Black/Nickel| Style Name:Swing Top| Design:Can

Introducing Venti Trash Can by Umbra

Style meets function with this large, easy-to-use garbage can that looks great! With brushed metal accents, a hassle-free swing-top lid, and the integrated neck ring, Venti keeps your waste (and garbage bag) out of sight and out of mind.

Venti Trash Can is constructed of durable black polypropylene so it’s sturdy and stable which means you don’t have to worry about it toppling over. At the same time, it’s easy to maintain – just wipe it clean with a damp cloth. Venti is large enough that you don’t have to constantly change the bag, but small enough to fit in almost any space in your home. Venti is especially useful as a kitchen trash can, but can be used anywhere in your home, in an outdoor environment, or even in a commercial space!

Designed by Umbra, Venti Trash Can comes in Black/Nickel or Black/Copper and is 35 inches tall by 14.5 inches in diameter, with a 16.5 gallon (62L) capacity. It works with the most popular 13-gallon (bag will hang inside the can) or 30-gallon garbage bags, including draw-sting and flap-tie bags.

About Umbra: A global product design company providing original, modern, casual, functional, and affordable design for the home.
feature_bullets: SIMPLE CLEAN DESIGN: Designed by Umbra, VENTI Trash Can have a simple yet effective design that looks great with any decor; the swing-top lid keeps garbage out of sight while the neck ring both holds and conceals the bag for a clean, modern look
DURABLE & EASY TO MAINTAIN: Venti is made of durable black polypropylene that is stable and easy to maintain; just wipe it clean with a damp cloth

FUNCTIONAL & EASY TO USE: Unlike other trash cans with foot pedals that can break over time, Venti features a hassle-free swing-top design that makes it super simple to use, just drop trash through the swing top and go

LARGE 16.5 GALLON (62L) CAPACITY: At 35 inches tall and 14.5 inches in diameter, Venti works with both 20-gal or 30-gal garbage bags, including draw-string and flap-tie bags so you won't have to worry about constantly taking out the trash

SUITABLE FOR RESIDENTIAL OR COMMERCIAL USE: Not only does Venti work great in your kitchen, workshop, or other areas in and around your home, it's also sturdy and durable enough for commercial use both inside or outside

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,160 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
